mean_cn: v. （用清水）刷，冲洗掉，漂净，漱口；  n. 漱洗，漂洗，漂清，冲洗
mean_en: to wash something with clean water only, not using soap; to remove the soap from something with clean water after washing it; to remove dirt, etc. from something by washing it with clean water
sentence: You should rinse the dishes before you put them in the dishwasher.
sentence_trans: 在把盘子放进洗碗机之前，要先用清水冲洗一下。
